title: Breakingviews TV: WPP’s woes
text:
Breakingviews TV: WPP’s woes 10:56pm IST - 04:20 
The ad group is investigating boss Martin Sorrell over alleged personal misconduct – but Sorrell is no ordinary CEO, and the advertising industry is already in a tight spot. Jen Saba and John Foley explain what’s at stake. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
The ad group is investigating boss Martin Sorrell over alleged personal misconduct – but Sorrell is no ordinary CEO, and the advertising industry is already in a tight spot. Jen Saba and John Foley explain what’s at stake. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2H8nFJF
